languages.text: This upgrade kit permanently improves the Rogue Trader's familiar maintenance stations. When applied to any of them, both are improved. ! The upgrade kits can only be used in numerical order.

traits.locale_text: The upgrade kit for your familiar's resting place. Apply it there to permanently improve it. Only applicable is Rogue Trader has a familiar. Both resting places are upgraded, when applied to either one. Note! Upgrade kits have to be used in order.

languages.text: This upgrade kit permanently improves the Rogue Trader's familiar maintenance stations. When applied to any of them, both are improved. ! The upgrade kits can only be used in numerical order. ! Can only be used if the Rogue Trader has the Overseer archetype.
languages.original_text: Этот модуль усовершенствует станции обслуживания фамильяра Вольного Торговца. При применении к одной из станций, они обе получают постоянное улучшение. ! Модули улучшения можно использовать только по порядку. ! Доступно, только если Вольный Торговец является надзирателем.

languages.text: Dieses Upgrade-Kit verbessert permanent die bekannten Wartungsstationen {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin}. Wird es bei einer davon benutzt, werden beide verbessert. ! Die Upgrade-Kits können nur in numerischer Reihenfolge benutzt werden. ! Kann nur benutzt werden, wenn {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} den Aufseher-Archetyp hat.
languages.original_text: This upgrade kit permanently improves the Rogue Trader's familiar maintenance stations. When applied to any of them, both are improved. ! The upgrade kits can only be used in numerical order. ! Can only be used if the Rogue Trader has the Overseer archetype.

traits.locale_text: Dieses Upgrade-Kit verbessert permanent die bekannten Wartungsstationen {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin}. Wird es bei einer davon benutzt, werden beide verbessert. ! Die Upgrade-Kits können nur in numerischer Reihenfolge benutzt werden. ! Kann nur benutzt werden, wenn {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} den Aufseher-Archetyp hat.

languages.text: Ce kit améliore de manière permanente les postes de maintenance de familier {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}. Lorsqu'il est appliqué à l'une d'entre elles, les deux sont améliorées.  ! Les kits d'amélioration ne peuvent être utilisés que dans l'ordre numérique croissant.  ! Utilisable uniquement par {mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande} ayant l'archétype surveillant.
languages.original_text: This upgrade kit permanently improves the Rogue Trader's familiar maintenance stations. When applied to any of them, both are improved. ! The upgrade kits can only be used in numerical order. ! Can only be used if the Rogue Trader has the Overseer archetype.

traits.locale_text: Ce kit améliore de manière permanente les postes de maintenance de familier {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}. Utilisable uniquement par {mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande} ayant l'archétype surveillant.

languages.text: 这个升级套装可以永久性强化行商浪人的使仆维修站。只要在任意一处维修站使用后，所有维修站都会得到强化。 ！升级套装必须按照数字顺序使用。 ！只有当行商浪人的职业为“监察官”时才能使用。
languages.original_text: This upgrade kit permanently improves the Rogue Trader's familiar maintenance stations. When applied to any of them, both are improved. ! The upgrade kits can only be used in numerical order. ! Can only be used if the Rogue Trader has the Overseer archetype.

这个升级套装可以永久性强化行商浪人的使仆维修站。只要在任意一处维修站使用后，所有维修站都会得到强化。 ！升级套装必须按照数字顺序使用。

languages.text: Este kit de mejora beneficia permanentemente a las estaciones de mantenimiento de familiares de tu Comerciante Independiente. Al aplicarlo a una de ellas, mejora ambas. ! Estos kits de mejora solo pueden usarse en orden numérico. ! Solo se puede usar si tu Comerciante Independiente tiene el arquetipo supervisor.
languages.original_text: This upgrade kit permanently improves the Rogue Trader's familiar maintenance stations. When applied to any of them, both are improved. ! The upgrade kits can only be used in numerical order. ! Can only be used if the Rogue Trader has the Overseer archetype.

Estos kits de mejora solo pueden usarse en orden numérico. ! Solo se puede usar si tu Comerciante Independiente tiene el arquetipo supervisor.

languages.text: このアップグレードキットにより、ローグトレーダーのファミリアーメンテナンスステーションは永続的に向上する。それらのいずれかに適用されると、両方が改善する。 ！アップグレードキットは、番号順でのみ使用できる。 ！ローグトレーダーが監督官タイプを持っている場合にのみ使用できる。

languages.text: Bu terfi kiti, Hür Tacir'in iye bakım istasyonlarını kalıcı olarak geliştirir. Herhangi birine uygulandığında hepsi birden gelişir. ! Terfi kitleri yalnızca sayısal sırayla kullanılabilir. ! Yalnızca Hür Tacir, Gözetmen arketipine sahipse kullanılabilir.

Bu terfi kiti, Hür Tacir'in iye bakım istasyonlarını kalıcı olarak geliştirir. Herhangi birine uygulandığında hepsi birden gelişir.
<i>! Terfi kitleri yalnızca sayısal sırayla kullanılabilir.
